description.ko: 생물 발광의 경이로움이 심해의 압도적인 고요를 밝히는 AQUA-5와 함께 바다 가장 깊은 곳으로의 여정을 떠나보세요.
description.en: Embark on a journey to the furthest reaches of the ocean floor with AQUA-5, where bioluminescent wonders illuminate the crushing silence of the abyss.

prompt: A futuristic deep-sea exploration submersible named AQUA-5 navigating through the midnight zone of the ocean, surrounded by bioluminescent jellyfish and glowing coral reefs, dark navy and neon cyan lighting, cinematic 8k, volumetric lighting, hyper-realistic underwater textures, atmospheric pressure bubbles.
